BR_text.BRsummary: Return invalid dtype when MPC is applied to Other Dtype Tensor
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
 
 When MPC is applied to the int tensor, it must be int but float return.
 <denchmark-h:h2>How to Reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 x = torch.tensor([1, 2, 3])
 print(x.dtype) # torch.int64
 
 x = share(bob, alice, crypto_provider=theo)
 print(x.dtype) # torch.float32 # should be torch.int64
 
 print(x.get().dtype) # torch.int64
 <denchmark-h:h2>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
 
 should be torch.int64
 <denchmark-h:h2>Screenshots</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39186433/89849067-a9f89380-dbc2-11ea-84aa-6bf791a46b78.png></denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>System Information</denchmark-h>
 
 
 OS: MAC
 OS Version: Catalina
 Language Version: Python3.7
 Package Manager Version: Conda 4.8.3
 Browser (if applicable): [e.g. Google Chrome]
 Browser Version (if applicable): [e.g. 81.0.4044.138]
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Additional Context</denchmark-h>
